snippet: Amid obstacles and doubts, Secretary of State John Kerry seeks doggedly to bring Israelis and Palestinians to the table to revive peace talks.
abstract: Editorial praises Sec of State John Kerry for his commitment to revive peace talks between Israelis and Palestinians; warns if headway is not made before United Nations General Assembly again debates Middle East, Kerry and Pres Obama will have to decide whether to keep investing energy on project without similar commitment by Israel and the Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: Amid obstacles and doubts, Secretary of State John Kerry seeks doggedly to bring Israelis and Palestinians to the table to revive peace talks.
